mapper.select: select a.* from ma_classification_ui_field a order by a.rowamount,a.columamount
mapper.insert:
insert into ma_classification_ui_field (guid, classificationuifk, classificationfieldguid, fieldname, title, DATASEQ, showtitle, readonly, froze, width, height, rowamount, columamount, columnspan, columnname, notinherited, format, mandatory,
createuserguid, createtime, updateuserguid, updatetime) values (#GUID#, #CLASSIFICATIONUIFK#, #CLASSIFICATIONFIELDGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TITLE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DATASEQ#, #SHOWTITLE#,
#READONLY#, #FROZE#, #WIDTH:VARCHAR:NULL#, #HEIGHT:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#ROWAMOUNT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #COLUMAMOUNT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #COLUMNSPAN:VARCHAR:NULL#, #COLUMNNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#NOTINHERITED#, #FORMAT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #MANDATORY:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#)
mapper.update:
update ma_classification_ui_field
CLASSIFICATIONUIFK = #CLASSIFICATIONUIFK#, CLASSIFICATIONFIELDGUID = #CLASSIFICATIONFIELDGUID#, FIELDNAME = #FIELDNAME#, title = #TITLE#, DATASEQ = #DATASEQ#, SHOWTITLE = #SHOWTITLE#, READONLY = #READONLY#, FROZE = #FROZE#, WIDTH = #WIDTH#, HEIGHT = #HEIGHT#, ROWAMOUNT = #ROWAMOUNT#, COLUMAMOUNT = #COLUMAMOUNT#, COLUMNSPAN = #COLUMNSPAN#, COLUMNNAME = #COLUMNNAME#, NOTINHERITED = #NOTINHERITED#, FORMAT = #FORMAT#, MANDATORY = #MANDATORY#,
updatetime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid = #UPDATEUSERGUID# where guid = #GUID#
